project.name: MapComplete Open Etymology Map
project.description: What is the origin of a toponym?

tags.description: The MapComplete theme Open Etymology Map has a layer Has etymolgy showing features with this tag
The MapComplete theme Open Etymology Map has a layer Has etymolgy showing features with this tag
The layer 'Has etymolgy shows images based on the keys image, image:0, image:1,... and  wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
The layer 'Has etymolgy shows images based on the keys image, image:0, image:1,... and  wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
The layer 'Has etymolgy shows images based on the keys image, image:0, image:1,... and  wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
The layer 'Has etymolgy shows images based on the keys image, image:0, image:1,... and  wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
Layer 'Has etymolgy' shows and asks freeform values for key 'name:etymology:wikidata' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Etymology Map')
Layer 'Has etymolgy' shows and asks freeform values for key 'name:etymology' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Etymology Map')

Layer 'Has etymolgy' shows name:etymology=unknown with a fixed text, namely 'The origin of this name is unknown in all literature' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Etymology Map')

The layer 'Has etymolgy allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Has etymolgy allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
